alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Schenectady, northwestern Albany, northern Schoharie and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Richmondville, or 9 miles west of Cobleskill, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 to 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cobleskill, Duanesburg, Middleburgh, Summit, Schoharie, Richmondville, Delanson, Central Bridge, Knox, Carlisle, Sharon, Seward, Charleston, Esperance, Duane, Zeh Corners, Beekman Corners, West Richmondville, Rockwell Corners and West Berne. This includes Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Montgomery; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Schenectady
